data.text: @DoggoMamma @jotaro2712 Totally agree with uâ€¦.she is a sick person and its imp to call such ppl out.such a hateful and poisonous woman.
@DoggoMamma When she says that her epic film's budget was 75 crore she is mocking herself and doesnt even have the brain to realize it.
@jotaro2712 @DoggoMamma No one even asked to come to this tweet and comment. Itna Vella hai kya ki dusro ki tweets pe ja ja kar comment karta hai.😂 Kangana ko bola kuch paise de de isi kaam ke.
@DoggoMamma @jotaro2712 The one done with HR is called cyber bullying. HR is generous enough to not file a case on her for the same.
@DoggoMamma I saw that on insta or as the kangu turd below states during "stalking". I can only imagine kangu be poppin xanax the last few days to calm herself 😹
@manishakimball @jotaro2712 Apni idol ki tarah saare 12th fail hai bechare. Kuch toh bots bhi hai 🤣 Kahan se layenge dimaag

@jotaro2712 @DoggoMamma Is someone forcing you on a gun point to read or follow @DoggoMamma posts? Why don't you simply block her if her posts seem so venomous to you? 😜 Aye kangu bhakts sochte nahi hai
@DoggoMamma @jotaro2712 "that your idol did to HR with her 3000 emails then" 😹😹😹😹😹😹😹😹
@jotaro2712 @DoggoMamma With that logic, you responded to her, so you must be stalking @DoggoMamma as well

@jotaro2712 I actually LOVE to read her posts stewing in jealousy & frustration 😂 She's hilarious! I'm just calling out the lies and the fact that only IT cell support her for Rs 2 tweets these days. Is that the gun forcing you to support her still or do you just lack comprehension skills?
